name: A Beast Outside
description:
- A Beast Outside is a game was done for a Game Jam, with Theme of Game Horror and Feral Beast, and it was my first Game Jam as well. This is a short game made in 30 days, so, enjoy the game and give me a feedback, tks.

- How To Play - Controls: 

*  Movement: A, S, W, D. 

* Interactions: E.  

* Pause Game: Esc, Pause, P.  

- The house and all the drawings in the game were done by myself.
